Sharing the November 2020 AMA recording

For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording within!

Sam Taggart

12 November 2020

Good day, all! ☀️

For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording here.

Included in the description of the video are:

1. the timestamps, for easy call navigation & 2. the presentation that was used during the call.

With any further questions, please head to our forum. Thanks!

communityama

Happy Holidays!

Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

Liquid security breach, action suggested

We have just been informed there has been a security incident at Liquid.com. Although no funds seem to have been affected by the breach, Liquid.com does recommend all customers to change their password and 2FA at their earliest convenience.
